column1: This is an application for a Writ of Prohibition preventing the 1st â€“ 4th Respondents inquiring
into  the  complaint  made  by  the  7th  Respondent  dated  31.01.2020  and  to  issue  a  Writ  of
Certiorari to quash the findings, decisions and recommendations of the 1st to 3rd respondents
in the report, in respect of the petitioner. The 1st to 3rd Respondents are the Chairman and
members  of  a  Presidential  Commission  of  Inquiry  appointed  by  H.E.  the  President  under
Section 2 of the Commissions of Inquiry Act no. 17 of 1948.
The Petitioner has not requested a relief preventing the Respondents from taking any steps
to implement or give effect to the recommendations of the final report in any way in so far as
The Petitioner seeks the following reliefs in his Petition dated 13.07.2020.
